typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GDP
source(output(
		TableName as string,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string,
		SpecialNotes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> mappingdata
GDP, mappingdata join({Country Name} == TableName,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Country Name},
		{Indicator Name},
		{2002},
		{2003},
		{2004},
		{2005},
		{2006},
		{2007},
		{2008},
		{2009},
		{2010},
		{2011},
		{2012},
		{2013},
		{2014},
		{2015},
		{2016},
		TableName,
		{Country Code},
		Region,
		IncomeGroup,
		SpecialNotes
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
RemoveColumns1 filter(equals(IncomeGroup, "Low income")) ~> Filter1
Filter1 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
RemoveColumns1 filter(equals(IncomeGroup, "High income")) ~> Filter2
Filter2 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		{Country Name},
		{Indicator Name},
		{2002},
		{2003},
		{2004},
		{2005},
		{2006},
		{2007},
		{2008},
		{2009},
		{2010},
		{2011},
		{2012},
		{2013},
		{2014},
		{2015},
		{2016},
		TableName,
		{Country Code},
		Region,
		IncomeGroup
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 filter(equals(IncomeGroup, "Lower middle income")) ~> Filter3
Filter3 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey3
RemoveColumns1 filter(equals(IncomeGroup, "Upper middle income")) ~> Filter4
Filter4 keyGenerate(output(id as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey4
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> LowIncome
SurrogateKey2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> HighIncome
SurrogateKey3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> LowerMiddleIncome
SurrogateKey4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		{Country Name} as string,
		{Indicator Name} as string,
		{2002} as long,
		{2003} as long,
		{2004} as long,
		{2005} as long,
		{2006} as long,
		{2007} as long,
		{2008} as long,
		{2009} as long,
		{2010} as long,
		{2011} as long,
		{2012} as long,
		{2013} as long,
		{2014} as long,
		{2015} as long,
		{2016} as long,
		{Country Code} as string,
		Region as string,
		IncomeGroup as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Uppermiddleincome
